name: Kshitu
greetingText: I love you my guusshiii buusshhii...
wishText: May the charm and happiness always be with you forever...♥️ ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you love...!! Yeee! May all your dreams come true ♥️
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
